mapper.select: select id, name, color, create_time, update_time from tag where id in ( select tag_id from article_tag_ref where article_id = #{articleId} )

select id, name, color, create_time, update_time, (select count(*) from article_tag_ref where tag_id = t.id) article_count from tag t
and name like concat('%',#{queryCond.keyword},'%')
order by article_count desc, create_time asc
